msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I wonder why someone left out?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I kind of like it,

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know, I wouldn't have thought of this as a good place to put .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But it really works, doesn't it? I should be taking design notes here. Where'd I put my pen

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know about you, but it fills me with a sense of calm whenever I walk by our .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's like our island has its very own guardian At least, that's how I like to think about it, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />There's a real fairy-tale vibe to <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I almost expect a goblin to throw out a riddle challenge,

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Seems kind of risky to leave
outside like this. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What about the melting risk, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />There's something soothing about <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Leaving decor like this outside feels like an invitation to meditate on nature, and I appreciate that.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I love the playful style of !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It reminds me of long afternoons spent building with wooden blocks when I was little,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's a little surreal to see out here like this. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It reminds me of an art piece I saw once, called "Walls Are Nonsense"

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wasn't expecting to find
left outside<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Who was it that said the great outdoors is the best classroom?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice of someone to leave
out for us.Gives this spot a resort feel. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now we just need to flag down a server to order some drinks!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Weird that someone left
around <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe they're just on a coffee break.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Seems fitting to set up outside.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The style matches the setting!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aw, who can resist ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sooo adorable, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Look what someone left out here !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Could've been shaken out of a tree
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is kind of a fun spot for .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Feels like dressing for a movie set.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Looks like someone around here must have forgotten to put away their !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Or maybe they're still planning to come back and play, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm curious to know how washed up here.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />If someone was going to leave their around outside<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />At least they went with materials that look sturdy enough to weather the elements, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This It's just so colorful and, well, eggy!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It makes me want to giggle for some reason. If only all furniture could be this much fun, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />There's something truly special about , right? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Anything made with that much thought and care should be treasured always, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm truly delighted to see
with a little space-age charm. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's a nice reminder that I am but an infinitesimal speck in this wide and grand universe we call home.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Here? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Someone must be planning a wedding! I wonder if they have a registry I better find out where it is before all the best gifts are taken!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I wonder what kind of effect it has, just standing near something like
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, am I giving off a mermaid vibe right now, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You know, I've been learning a lot about constellations recently.Each constellation has its own story behind it. Brave heroes Romantic twists It's all so enchanting! I suppose it's no wonder I was drawn to this piece, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Have we been living on a pirate island this entire time, or is this a recent development, ? Either way, I hope the pirates will let me join their crew. I've been meaning to sign up for sailing lessons

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, how lovely! I really do appreciate the sight of .These kinds of things really carry me off and away, thinking about all the beauty of autumn.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sorry, but I just can't help getting swept off by my own thoughts sometimes, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What am I looking at? Scary or adorable, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Or scadorable? That's goofy, but you can't blame me. I'm scared silly, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! Look, , it's !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's just one of those things that brightens your day any time you see it, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I get a fuzzy feeling when seeing .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A nice meal outdoors with friends, your in full view What a lovely thought, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My heart's all aflutter! All it took was one little peek at .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's like my body is overflowing with a mesmerizing rhythm. I couldn't fight it if I wanted to, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm truly infatuated with our .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />This spot looks like a location from one of those fancy travel magazines!In fact, if we submitted a photo, I bet one of their writers would come interview us. Wouldn't that be fun?
